unstructured.content: Wayne Enterprises is a global conglomerate with divisions in technology, biotech, defense contracting, shipping, manufacturing, and real estate. We need comprehensive coverage across all these sectors.
Our R&D division has significant experimental technology that requires specialized coverage. Last year, we had an incident in our applied sciences division that resulted in a $12M claim.
We currently maintain a $500M general liability policy with a $5M deductible. Our property insurance covers assets valued at over $100B across our global operations.
Directors and officers liability is a particular concern given our size and public profile. We're looking to increase our D&O coverage from $250M to $500M.
We're particularly interested in coverage for business interruption scenarios. Our current policy has a 72-hour waiting period, which we'd like to reduce to 24 hours if possible.
We have a large global fleet of vehicles, including specialized transport for our defense and applied sciences divisions. We currently have auto liability coverage of $50M.
